name: The Da Vinci Cryptex 3
description:
The genial Italian inventor is back with new logical puzzles!



Unlock the Cryptex by solving the riddles drawn in a book, it seems easy, but you need to use all your brain skills to escape!


The Da Vinci Cryptex 3 is a brainteasing game with 50 unique handdrawn puzzles. The more you crack them, the harder they become

Warning: This game may be addictive!


- 50 new unique enigmas that will put your brain to work
- Hints available (click the bulb button to get a hint)
- A new room you're trapped in
- Captivating background music

If you're a fan of puzzles, word games, brain thinking, mind games, IQ logic riddles, and enigmas, The Da Vinci Cryptex is the game for you, have fun in your spare time!


XSGames is a solo indie game developer from Italy.
